CS131 Distributed Systems

Lecture 1 Introduction

Lecture 2-3 DS Hardware Systems and programming

Lecture 4 MPI

Lecture 5-6 More MPI, programming models

Lecture 8 Logical clocks

Lecture 9 Notation,Snapshots

Lecture 10 Peterson-Kearns rollback recovery

Lecture 11 Waves

Lecture 12 Deadlock detection

Lecture 13 Termination detection

Lecture 14 Elections

Lecture 15 Mutual exclusion

Lecture 16 More mutual exclusion

Lecture 17 Consesnsus with failures

Lecture 18 Consesnsus with failures II

Lecture 19 Byzantine failures

Lecture 20 Consistency 1

Lecture 21 Consistency 2

Lecture 22 Datacenters
